front.title: The FIPS PUB JJJ Entity Authentication GSS-API Mechanism

abstract.t: This specification defines protocols, procedures, and conventions to be employed by peers implementing the Generic Security Service Application Program Interface, as specified in RFCs 1508 and 1509 [2] [3], (and as amended by the Internet Draft defining GSS-API Version 2 [4]) when using the FIPS PUB JJJ class of authentication mechanisms (as defined in FIPS PUB JJJ [1]).
